kpi_info.title: UNKNOWN
kpi_info.use: Average number of roaming unknown subscribers during the reporting period. The measured object is the name of the PLMN where the measured values came from. This is the textual identifier of the roaming partner PLMN. There is a special PLMN name called "UNKNOWN" which means those HLR addresses and PLMNs where whether the HLR address or the PLMN index is not known.
